body:
**Enhancements**

Specialty Mapping - Model Networks Page

When a specialty mapping is no longer associated with the project or has been deleted, the following should happen.

* After the project refresh, model will be in a draft state.
* When the user views the Manage Models page:

  * The status = Draft
  * If the specialty mapping is missing, the specialty mapping = "Not available" (in red)
* When the user edits the model criteria, the specialty mapping field will be blank, and the user will be required to select a new specialty mapping for the model.
